languages.text: "Что делают подобные мне в реальном мире, {name}? Собирали жатву. Комморра требовала мяса — в недавней дизъюнкции Темный город понес потери. Нам нужны были источники сладостной боли, чтобы напоить ей умы и тела. Когда архонт моего кабала повелела собрать урожай с региона, я не подозревал, что это обернется нашей с тобой игрой".

"What do any of my kind do in realspace, {name}? We were reaping. Commorragh was clamouring for meat — the Dark City had suffered losses in the latest dysjunction. We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."
languages.original_text: "Что делают подобные мне в реальном мире, {name}? Собирали жатву. Комморра требовала мяса — в недавней дизъюнкции Темный город понес потери. Нам нужны были источники сладостной боли, чтобы напоить ей умы и тела. Когда архонт моего кабала повелела собрать урожай с региона, я не подозревал, что это обернется нашей с тобой игрой".

We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Lo mismo que siempre hace mi gente en el espacio real, {name}. Estábamos cosechando. Commorragh necesitaba carne. La Ciudad Siniestra había sufrido pérdidas durante la última disyunción. Necesitábamos fuentes de dulce dolor para saciar sus mentes y cuerpos. Cuando la Arconte ordenó a mi Kábala que cosechara la región, no esperaba que eso diera pie a este juego que hay entre nosotros».
languages.original_text: "What do any of my kind do in realspace, {name}? We were reaping. Commorragh was clamouring for meat — the Dark City had suffered losses in the latest dysjunction. We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."

traits.locale_text: «Lo mismo que siempre hace mi gente en el espacio real, {name}. Estábamos cosechando. Commorragh necesitaba carne. La Ciudad Siniestra había sufrido pérdidas durante la última disyunción. Necesitábamos fuentes de dulce dolor para saciar sus mentes y cuerpos. Cuando la Arconte ordenó a mi Kábala que cosechara la región, no esperaba que eso diera pie a este juego que hay entre nosotros».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我的族人来到真实世界会做什么，{name}？当然是收割了。科摩罗迫切需要新鲜的肉。空间分崩离析，黑暗之城损失惨重，我们那些美妙的痛苦滋补它的身心。当我的执政官令我的阴谋团前往那片区域，进行收割的时候，我并没有想到那会变成你我之间的游戏。”
languages.original_text: "What do any of my kind do in realspace, {name}? We were reaping. Commorragh was clamouring for meat — the Dark City had suffered losses in the latest dysjunction. We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."

traits.locale_text: “我的族人来到真实世界会做什么，{name}？当然是收割了。科摩罗迫切需要新鲜的肉。空间分崩离析，黑暗之城损失惨重，我们那些美妙的痛苦滋补它的身心。当我的执政官令我的阴谋团前往那片区域，进行收割的时候，我并没有想到那会变成你我之间的游戏。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺の仲間がリアルスペースでいったい何をしているかだって、{name}？収穫だよ。コモラフは肉を求めて大騒ぎになっていた。仄暗き都は最近起きた分裂に傷ついていたのさ。我々はその心と体を刺激する甘い痛みの源を必要としていた。アーコンが俺の陰謀団にその地域から収穫物を集めるように命じたとき、それがお前と俺との間で戦いに発展するとは思わなかったんだ」
languages.original_text: "What do any of my kind do in realspace, {name}? We were reaping. Commorragh was clamouring for meat — the Dark City had suffered losses in the latest dysjunction. We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の仲間がリアルスペースでいったい何をしているかだって、{name}？収穫だよ。コモラフは肉を求めて大騒ぎになっていた。仄暗き都は最近起きた分裂に傷ついていたのさ。我々はその心と体を刺激する甘い痛みの源を必要としていた。アーコンが俺の陰謀団にその地域から収穫物を集めるように命じたとき、それがお前と俺との間で戦いに発展するとは思わなかったんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « À votre avis, {name}, que viennent faire ceux de mon espèce dans l'espace réel ? Nous opérions une rafle, bien sûr. Commorragh était en manque de chair fraîche, après les pertes essuyées au cours des récents troubles. Nous avions besoin de nouvelles sources de souffrance pour galvaniser ses habitants. Quand l'archonte a chargé ma Kabale de récolter la moisson de la région, je ne me doutais pas que ma mission donnerait lieu à ce petit jeu entre vous et moi. »
languages.original_text: "What do any of my kind do in realspace, {name}? We were reaping. Commorragh was clamouring for meat — the Dark City had suffered losses in the latest dysjunction. We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."

traits.locale_text: « À votre avis, {name}, que viennent faire ceux de mon espèce dans l'espace réel ? Nous opérions une rafle, bien sûr. Commorragh était en manque de chair fraîche, après les pertes essuyées au cours des récents troubles. Nous avions besoin de nouvelles sources de souffrance pour galvaniser ses habitants. Quand l'archonte a chargé ma Kabale de récolter la moisson de la région, je ne me doutais pas que ma mission donnerait lieu à ce petit jeu entre vous et moi. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Was tut meinesgleichen wohl im Realraum, {name}? Wir haben geerntet. Commorragh hat nach Fleisch geschrien — die Dunkle Stadt hatte bei der letzten Trennung Verluste erlitten. Wir waren auf Quellen süßer Schmerzen angewiesen, als Initialzündung für Körper und Geist der Stadt. Als der Archon meiner Kabale auftrug, in der Region zu ernten, ahnte ich nicht, dass sich daraus dieses Spiel zwischen Euch und mir entwickeln würde."
languages.original_text: "What do any of my kind do in realspace, {name}? We were reaping. Commorragh was clamouring for meat — the Dark City had suffered losses in the latest dysjunction. We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."

traits.locale_text: "Was tut meinesgleichen wohl im Realraum, {name}? Wir haben geerntet. Commorragh hat nach Fleisch geschrien — die Dunkle Stadt hatte bei der letzten Trennung Verluste erlitten. Wir waren auf Quellen süßer Schmerzen angewiesen, als Initialzündung für Körper und Geist der Stadt. Als der Archon meiner Kabale auftrug, in der Region zu ernten, ahnte ich nicht, dass sich daraus dieses Spiel zwischen Euch und mir entwickeln würde."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "What do any of my kind do in realspace, ? We were reaping. Commorragh was clamouring for meat — the Dark City had suffered losses in the latest dysjunction. We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."

languages.text: "Türdeşlerim gerçekuzayda ne yapıyor {name}? Katliam. Commorragh, kan diye haykırıyordu... Son ayrışımda Kara Şehir, bir hayli kayıp verdi. Akıllar, bedenler kendine gelsin diye güzel acı kaynakları lazımdı. Arkon, bölgede hasat için Kabalımı görevlendirdiğinde aramızda böyle bir münasebet gelişeceğini hiç düşünmemiştim doğrusu."
languages.original_text: "What do any of my kind do in realspace, {name}? We were reaping. Commorragh was clamouring for meat — the Dark City had suffered losses in the latest dysjunction. We needed sources of sweet pain to prime its minds and bodies. When the Archon bade my Kabal collect the harvest from the region, I did not suspect that it would turn into this game between you and me."

traits.locale_text: "Bizler gerçekuzayda ne yapıyoruz {name}? Katliam. Commorragh kan diye haykırıyordu... Son ayrılışta Kara Şehir, bir hayli kayıp verdi. Akıllar, bedenler kendine gelsin diye güzel acı kaynakları lazımdı. Arkon, bölgede hasat için benim Kabalı görevlendirdiğinde aramızda böyle bir münasebet gelişeceğini hiç düşünmemiştim doğrusu."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
